"use client";

import {
  NavigationMenu,
  NavigationMenuItem,
  NavigationMenuLink,
  NavigationMenuList,
  navigationMenuTriggerStyle,
} from "@/components/ui/navigation-menu";

const NavigationMenuSimple = () => {
  return (
    <NavigationMenu>
      <NavigationMenuList>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="#" className={navigationMenuTriggerStyle()}>
            Home
          </NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="#" className={navigationMenuTriggerStyle()}>
            About
          </NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="#" className={navigationMenuTriggerStyle()}>
            Services
          </NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
        <NavigationMenuItem>
          <NavigationMenuLink href="#" className={navigationMenuTriggerStyle()}>
            Contact
          </NavigationMenuLink>
        </NavigationMenuItem>
      </NavigationMenuList>
    </NavigationMenu>
  );
};

export { NavigationMenuSimple }
